twitter_threads.thread_topic: How I grew to 500K Instagram followers (the real strategy)
tweets:
üßµ THREAD: How I grew to 500K Instagram followers in 18 months

(The real strategy no one talks about)

Most growth advice is BS. Here's what actually worked: üëá

1/ CONTENT AUDIT REVELATION

Analyzed top 1000 posts in my niche:
‚Ä¢ 60% were recycled content
‚Ä¢ 30% were low-effort posts  
‚Ä¢ 10% were genuinely valuable

Opportunity: Create the missing 90%

2/ THE 40/30/20/10 CONTENT FORMULA

‚Ä¢ 40% Educational (how-to guides)
‚Ä¢ 30% Personal (behind-the-scenes)
‚Ä¢ 20% Community (user features)
‚Ä¢ 10% Promotional (soft sells)

This ratio = 10x engagement vs. random posting

3/ TIMING IS EVERYTHING

Tested 100+ posting times over 6 months:
‚Ä¢ Peak times: 6-8am, 12-2pm, 7-9pm
‚Ä¢ Worst times: 10am-12pm, 3-5pm
‚Ä¢ Stories: Every 4-6 hours for algorithm signals

40% engagement boost from timing alone

4/ HASHTAG STRATEGY THAT WORKS

‚Ä¢ 70% niche hashtags (100K-500K posts)
‚Ä¢ 20% trending hashtags (1M+ posts)
‚Ä¢ 10% branded hashtags

Avoid: Massive hashtags (10M+ posts)
Result: 300% reach increase

5/ THE COLLABORATION MULTIPLIER

‚Ä¢ Guest posts with complementary accounts
‚Ä¢ Cross-promotion partnerships
‚Ä¢ Joint live sessions
‚Ä¢ Shared giveaways

80% of my growth came from collaborations

6/ ALGORITHM HACKING (Ethical)

‚Ä¢ Post consistently (2-3x daily)
‚Ä¢ Respond to comments within 30 minutes
‚Ä¢ Use all Instagram features (Reels, Stories, IGTV)
‚Ä¢ Create 'save-worthy' content

Algorithm rewards consistency + engagement

7/ MONETIZATION STRATEGY

‚Ä¢ Months 1-6: Build audience (no selling)
‚Ä¢ Months 7-12: Soft product mentions
‚Ä¢ Months 13+: Full monetization

Result: $50K/month from 500K followers

The complete strategy (including content templates, hashtag lists, and automation tools) is in my Instagram Growth Course.

Normally $197, but free for my Twitter followers: [Course Link]

Grab it before I remove this offer üëá
